pros: Leadership for 30+ years by a single individual with a vision of healthy long term care gave this organization a long history of putting clients first in a family atmosphere combined with a sincere dedication to the population served made this organization a leader in the state. The long term view of caring for people throughout a lifetime and retaining managers toward that end was essential to the success of the client care provided.
cons: Recent changes in top management and philosophy changed the focus to financial expansion which lead to a short-term view. This increased rapid changes in middle management increasing instability and dissatisfaction among staff which fueled more changes in middle management create further instability and dissatisfaction.

job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse in Orlando, FL
pros: The clients are amazing! Very rewarding. Awesome teamwork at my location. Fun. Felt less like a business because the clients always came first at that time. Awesome family members.
cons: Overall management is terrible. No loyalty to long term staff. Quest has steadily declined the last few years. As I left, it was becoming more of a business, less about the clients. Hard to watch the fall.

review_title: Never hated a place so much!
pros: Job is easy. Clients are awesome. No overtime so you know exactly what hours you are working.
cons: Pay sucks for the amount of work you do. Management is clueless. Staff are gossipy. No teamwork. Discipline isnt the same for everybody. Don't allow overtime so they would rather be extremely short staffed then pay a few extra dollars to staff who would willingly work extra hours. Dont enforce the attendance policy at all so people come and go when they want.
